text:
He struggled in darkness. 

“Why do I suffer?” he whispered. 

The world felt heavy. 

He wrote, seeking light. 

Words flowed, but pain lingered. 

“Is this my fate?” he asked. 

Hope flickered, then dimmed. 

He fought through despair. 

“Through it, I will rise,” he vowed. 

The journey was long. 

But he pressed on, determined.

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Through it he became great.
